trans-unit.source: Wraps an XSD <xref uid="langword_csharp_gYear" name="gYear" href=""></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il wrapping di uno schema XSD <xref uid="langword_csharp_gYear" name="gYear" href=""> </xref> tipo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XSD data types, see "XML Data Types Reference" in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui tipi di dati XSD, vedere "Riferimenti dei tipi di dati XML" in MSDN all'indirizzo http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear"></xref> class with a specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear"> </xref> classe con un oggetto specificato <xref:System.DateTime>oggetto.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object to initialize the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.DateTime>oggetto per inizializzare l'istanza corrente.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear"></xref> class with a specified <xref:System.DateTime> object and an integer that indicates whether <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear.Value*> is a positive or negative value.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear"> </xref> classe con un oggetto specificato <xref:System.DateTime>oggetto e un numero intero che indica se <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear.Value*>è un valore positivo o negativo.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear.Value*> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object to initialize the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.DateTime>oggetto per inizializzare l'istanza corrente.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates whether `value` is positive.
trans-unit.target: Un intero che indica se `value` è un valore positivo.

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il linguaggio XML Schema definition (XSD) del tipo SOAP corrente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che indica lo schema XSD di tipo SOAP corrente.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref:System.String> into a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Converte l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.String>in un <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The Parse method is capable of parsing strings in various formats.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo di analisi è in grado di analizzare le stringhe in formati diversi.

trans-unit.source: The recognizable string formats are composed out of the following format patterns.
trans-unit.target: Formati di stringa riconoscibili sono composti da modelli di formato seguenti.

trans-unit.source: |Format Pattern|Description|Examples| |--------------------|-----------------|--------------| |yyyy|The year in 4-digit format.|1999, 1812| |zzz|The full time zone offset (hour and minutes) from the Universal Time Coordinate (Greenwich Mean Time).
trans-unit.target: | Modello di formato | Descrizione | Esempi di | |--------------------|-----------------|--------------| | aaaa | Anno nel formato a 4 cifre. | 1999, 1812 | | zzz | Full offset del fuso orario (ora e minuti) da Universal Time Coordinate (Greenwich Mean Time).

trans-unit.source: Single-digit hours have a leading zero.|-07:00, 08:00|
trans-unit.target: Ore di cifra hanno uno zero iniziale. | -07:00, 08:00 |

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.String>da convertire.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A object that is obtained from value.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto oggetto ottenuto da value .

trans-unit.source: value does not contain a date and time that corresponds to any of the recognized format patterns.
trans-unit.target: valuenon contiene una data e ora che corrisponde a uno dei modelli di formato riconosciuto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the date and time of the current instance is positive or negative.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta se la data e l'ora dell'istanza corrente è positivo o negativo.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates whether <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear.Value*> is positive or negative.
trans-unit.target: Un intero che indica se <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear.Value*>è positivo o negativo.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear.Value*> as a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear.Value*>un <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is obtained from <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear.Value*> in the format "yyyy" or "-yyyy" if <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear.Sign*> is negative.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>ottenuto da <> </> *> nel formato "aaaa" o "-yyyy" se <> </> *> è negativo.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date and time of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la data e ora dell'istanza corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> object that contains the date and time of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DateTime>oggetto che contiene la data e l'ora dell'istanza corrente.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il linguaggio XML Schema definition (XSD) del tipo SOAP corrente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che indica lo schema XSD di tipo SOAP corrente.</xref:System.String>
